articles.author: Lauren del Valle, CNN
articles.title: Amber Heard's post-trial motions in case against Johnny Depp denied by judge - CNN
articles.description: A Virginia judge denied seven post-trial motions Amber Heard filed in an attempt to fight the jury verdict handed down in the defamation case with her ex-husband Johnny Depp.

articles.description: Fans of Jersey Shore will have to wait even longer to see the new and improved version of the hit reality show. According to TMZ , the new show Jersey Shore 2.0 has halted production.
